General.Name: ZipRecruiter Inc.
General.Description: ZipRecruiter, Inc., together with its subsidiaries, operates a marketplace that connects job seekers and employers. The company's platform is a two-sided marketplace, which enables employers to post jobs and access other features, where the job seekers are able to apply to jobs with a single click. ZipRecruiter, Inc. was incorporated in 2010 and is headquartered in Santa Monica, California.
General.Address: 604 Arizona Avenue, Santa Monica, CA, United States, 90401

6.Name: Mr. Ryan T. Sakamoto J.D.
